name: Island Treasure
description:
Created for the Web Monetization Challenge 2020, in about 2-3 days! Super late to the party, but I hope to expand on the game after the jam concludes. 

Find the buried treasure, sound simple right? You have a limited number of shovels and some you'll find some clues under the sand! 

Hope you enjoy the game, and be sure to leave any feedback in the comments!
